disease_name: Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (specifically classical type or hypermobile type)
Marfan syndrome (excluded due to lack of cardiovascular and ocular features)
Loeys-Dietz syndrome (excluded due to lack of arterial and skin manifestations)
Homocystinuria (less likely given the absence of ocular and vascular symptoms)
Osteogenesis imperfecta (less likely given the exclusion of blue sclerae and osteoporosis)
